title: An Act authorizing the Barnstable County and the town of Bourne to convey land and certain interests in land in the town of Bourne

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Vieira of Falmouth, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2351) of David T. Vieira (by vote of the town) that Barnstable County be authorized to convey land and certain interests in land in the town of Bourne to said town.  Municipalities and Regional Government.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 05/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on House Ways and Means
committee on House Ways and Means

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass with an amendment, substituting therefor a bill, see H4992
Referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting for a second reading with the amendment pending
Read second, amended (as recommended by the committee on House Ways and Means)
